Installation
=====================

Required Installation
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The following items have to be installed in order to use MCTennis.

**Java**

> Java 8 - Java Latest

**Paper or Spigot**

> Spigot 1.20.2 - Latest ✔
> Paper(Spigot) 1.20.2 - Latest  ✔
> CraftBukkit ✘ (not compatible)
> Sponge ✘ (not compatible)

MCTennis

> MCTennis.jar
